title: Is Firecracker Jinx going to be legacy?
body: I know the skin came with the celebration of the chinese new year or sth. Do you think that it will become legacy? {{champion:222}}

replies.body: Every skin will become a legacy skin at one point or another. However, i dont think her skin will go into the vault for a long time
Rito actually said that every skin would become a legacy at some point? (Asking cause if so, I should buy the ones I've been eyeing lol...)

yes because riot like to recycle older skin that nobody wants to buy for later when that champion becomes more popular. it is a business strat and Riot is a business. Riot will let you know ahead of time if a skin will become a legacy skin. So if you want to wait for the skin you have been eyeing to become on sale, then you should wait.

Hiya! 

As others have mentioned, if she were to be legacy, she would have become available after the Lunar Revel ended. She's currently still in the store for purchase, which means she's not a legacy skin. :]

We do have a legacy which contain older skins, but it'll be a while before she ends up in there!
The less people wearing that skin the better.
Na it won't. If it was gonna be legacy it would have left the store a loooong time ago.
